dcterms:creator: J. Federici
L. Moeller
dcterms:description: A review of terahertz and subterahertz wireless communications, discussing the potential and challenges of using terahertz frequencies for wireless communication.
dcterms:title: Terahertz communications

dcterms:creator: I. F. Akyildiz
J. M. Jornet
C. Han
dcterms:description: An exploration of the terahertz band as the next frontier for wireless communications, highlighting its potential for high data rates and massive connectivity.
dcterms:title: Terahertz band

dcterms:creator: I. F. Akyildiz
J. M. Jornet
dcterms:description: A study on electromagnetic wireless nanosensor networks, focusing on the design and implementation of nanoscale communication systems.
dcterms:title: Electromagnetic wireless nanosensor networks

dcterms:creator: I. F. Akyildiz
J. M. Jornet
C. Han
dcterms:description: A discussion on TeraNets, which are ultra-broadband communication networks operating in the terahertz band, emphasizing their potential applications.
dcterms:title: TeraNets

dcterms:creator: J. M. Jornet
J. C. Pujol
J. S. Pareta
dcterms:description: Phlame is a physical layer aware MAC protocol designed for electromagnetic nanonetworks operating in the terahertz band, focusing on efficient communication strategies.
dcterms:title: Phlame

dcterms:creator: C. Han
J. M. Jornet
I. F. Akyildiz
dcterms:description: A study on ultra-massive MIMO channel modeling for terahertz-band communications, focusing on the unique characteristics of THz channels.
dcterms:title: Ultra-massive MIMO channel modeling

dcterms:creator: A. Alkhateeb
R. W. Heath
dcterms:description: A study on frequency selective hybrid precoding techniques for limited feedback millimeter wave systems, addressing the challenges in hybrid beamforming.
dcterms:title: Frequency selective hybrid precoding

dcterms:creator: J. Rodriguez-Fernandez
N. Gonzalez-Prelcic
K. Venugopal
R. W. Heath
dcterms:description: A method for frequency-domain compressive channel estimation tailored for frequency-selective hybrid millimeter wave MIMO systems, enhancing channel estimation accuracy.
dcterms:title: Frequency-domain compressive channel estimation
